name: UPODESTA
body:
According to historic records, Income Tax was introduced to the Indian sub-continent public in 1860. After a couple of years, it got abolished because people were not satisfied that they had to pay some amount of their incomes. But afterwards, it was reinforced again as the government noticed its importance in terms of the total revenue of the country.

Like any other country, in Bangladesh the taxation polices are also quite hectic and complicated that people fail to understand that. Mostly for an outsider the taxation rules are really tough to understand. One can find a huge versatility in the taxation. A slight error in the preparation of Income Tax Returns can further complicate the problem and make you experience great hassles. Whether you are a business owner or an individual, tax is something that you will have to file within the specified deadlines and no one can avoid. To handle all this while handle the business is quite a headache and this is where professional are being hired for customized Tax Planning. So, Tax planning is very important for a safe future. You might earn a lot, but if you cannot save your money in a proper way, hard consequences may be awaiting you in the near future. Tax planning includes different topics. If you are aware of all these topics, you can enjoy your days after retirement without any tension.

Income tax of Bangladesh has been levied on all the professions. This is the tax which is levied on working class of the country. Any individual who earns a living is supposed to pay a specified amount of tax according to what he earns. This amount is specified according to the amount on income earned. If the income of a person is more, he is supposed to pay a bigger percentage of tax. However, if the income is less, the tax is less too. 

If you are ready to do some smart work, you can run here a good business to enjoy profits because of Bangladesh is known as a land of opportunities. Plenty of resources are available in this country that will help to paint your dreams beautifully. There are different things that you should however consider and take care of while running a business organization. All the records related to the functioning of the firm have to be perfect in order to avoid any hassle. Similarly, you should also make good use of the options before you in order to enjoy maximum returns annually.

The best way to empower you with the knowledge of these topics is to seek help from professional Income Tax Advisors. While choosing the right one, you must verify a few questions. The important things to be considered are for how long the Tax Advisor is in this field, what is the educational qualification of the professional, whether he is a member in the Taxes Bar Association or not. Once you get satisfactory answers to these questions, it is safe to go ahead with the Tax Advisor in order to get professional advice in the Customized Tax Planning.
